title: Adani Energy Arm to Form JV with Esyasoft for Smart Metering Biz
description: The agreement has been entered into to enable, among other things, licensing by EHL to intellectual property rights of software products and solutions for smart meters and other industrial applications and further development of such products and solutions by a joint venture company of ATSFL and EHL, it said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
